name: Install GP - Beta
description:
**Install Gentooplayer on internal HD or anather usb stick** 
 **Warning:** is not strictly necessary, but the advice is to keep only the HD where to install GentooPlayer connected to the PC.

 **Warning:** Depending on the speed of the optical media and/or the CPU, the process can take a long time (even hours).
